constraints.name: equal_distribution
constraints.description: 所有容器的最终水量必须相等

constraints.name: transfer_amount_non_negative
constraints.description: 每次转移的水量必须是非负数

constraints.name: source_capacity_limit
constraints.description: 源容器的水量不能超过其初始水量

constraints.name: target_capacity_limit
constraints.description: 目标容器的水量不能超过其最大容量
